heading: HR01966
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY ON THE MITIGATION IMPACT OF THE ANTI-POVERTY MEASURES AND PROGRAMS OF THE DIFFERENT NATIONAL GOVERNMENT AGENCIES AND INSTRUMENTALITIES ON THE INTENDED BENEFICIARIES, THE WORKING POOR, INFORMAL SETTLERS AND OTHER MARGINALIZED SECTORS OF SOCIETY- AND TO RECOMMEND APPROPRIATE MEASURES AND/OR LEGISLATIONS
